import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Booking=()=>{const[formData,setFormData]=useState({date:'',time:'',guests:1});const handleChange=e=>{setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await fetch('/api/bookings',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({customer_id:1,// Replace with the actual logged-in user ID
date:formData.date,time:formData.time,party_size:formData.guests})});const result=await response.json();if(response.ok){alert('Booking confirmed!');}else{alert(result.error||'Booking failed.');}}catch(err){alert('An error occurred while booking.');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"booking-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Book Your Table"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",name:"date",value:formData.date,onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"time",name:"time",value:formData.time,onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",name:"guests",value:formData.guests,onChange:handleChange,min:"1",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Confirm Booking"})]})]});};export default Booking;
